entry.content:
Over the last year, as a Software Engineering Intern at Red Hat, Iâ€™ve gotten deeper into Open Source and Software Engineering in general â€” and along the way, Iâ€™ve picked up a lot. From managing dependencies in Node.js, exploring containerization, navigating GitHub Workflows, becoming a maintainer in the Backstage project, to even giving presentations and submitting proposals for tech conferences â€” itâ€™s been a learning curve (in the best way). At some point, I realized I wanted a place to:

  • Reflect on what Iâ€™m learning
  • Share the contributions I make to open source projects
  • Write about dev concepts that interest me
  • Keep track of my growth as a developer

This blog is that space.

Itâ€™s for me, but also for anyone else who might find value in the journey â€” especially if youâ€™re starting out or exploring similar paths.
